description: This Java source file defines the NoteController class, a REST controller in a Spring Boot application, providing CRUD API endpoints for managing notes. It handles creating, listing, retrieving, updating, patching, and deleting notes, and integrates Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: NoteController
classes.description: A REST controller providing CRUD operations for notes, following REST principles with Spring Boot and annotated for Swagger documentation.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note using data from the request body and returns the created note response.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all notes.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note identified by its UUID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Performs a full update (replace) of a note identified by UUID.

methods.name: patch
methods.description: Partially updates a note using a patch request.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its UUID.
